info.description: This is a custody wallet service openapi server.

parameters.description: The cursor to use for pagination.
parameters.name: cursor

parameters.description: The number of records to return default: 20
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Unique system generated identifier of the wallet
parameters.name: wallet_ids

parameters.description: The blockchain network on which the transaction takes place.
parameters.name: chain_ids

parameters.name: cursor

parameters.description: The transaction hash, which uniquely identifies a transaction on the blockchain.
parameters.name: hash

parameters.description: The number of records to return default: 20
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The tokenId involved in the transaction.
parameters.name: token_ids

parameters.name: wallet_ids

parameters.description: The token id used in the transaction (e.g., TON, USDT_ETH, etc.).
parameters.name: token_id

eventTypes.description: The event types of the endpoint

destination.description: The ID of the wallet to which the transfer will be made

source.description: The ID of the wallet from which the transfer will be made
